title: FS: T207 Red Cycle Mike Donlin SGC 4.5
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: FS: T207 Red Cycle Mike Donlin SGC 4.5
posts.post_content:
Just six graded with this one the second highest.  Really spectacular card, not sure why it's only a 4.5. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2kLRbb1][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51046991668_1ffb468d67_c.jpg[/img][/url]

$8500 net to me, delivered.  PM or email if interested, thanks.
